misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The use of the Data Encryption Standard (DES) algorithm, which is a weak symmetric-key block cipher, is a security misuse. DES has been shown to be vulnerable to various attacks and has been largely replaced by stronger algorithms such as AES.
recommendation: Replace the use of DES with a more modern and secure encryption algorithm, such as AES.
